title: A Summary of Ancient Practices and Symbols.
first_phrase: This section explores the use of ancient tradition and techniques used in psychology. It references books such as "Il Simbolismo Ermetico" by Wirth and "La voie de l’Itlaq" by Charles Antoni. It also discusses Lefebure's research and the use of polarized light in exercises. The text mentions the significance of the number four in cathedral symbolism, as well as the practice of leaving space in alchemic vessels. The author reminds the reader that the physical methods described are simply models to help induce specific states in individuals and must be examined in the light of consciousness.
